The PLOT ontology

Ontology RDF
RDF (turtle)

Description

This vocabulary provides a set of classes to support capture of plot- and site-based ecological survey data. It is primary related to vegetation surveys, following the methdologies outlined in the Australian Soil and Land Survey Field Handbook.

PLOT is technically an extension to the W3C SSN/SOSA vocabulary, and also uses elements from the SSN-EXT ontology.

Table of Contents

  1. Classes
  2. Object Properties
  3. Datatype Properties
  4. Namespaces
  5. Legend

Locationc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Location
Super-classes dct:Locationc
Restrictions http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/mapsheetNumberdp max 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/mapsheetNamedp max 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/mapScaleop max 1
locn:geometry some geo:Pointc
In domain of http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/isLocationOfop

Organism Occurrence c

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/OrganismOccurence
Description
  1. sub-class of Sample because observations of an organism occurrence are primarily interesting if they represents a commuity or assemblage
  2. sub-class of SpatialObject because it is bound to a specified location
  3. sub-class of TemporalEntity because it is bound to a specified time
Super-classes geosparql:SpatialObjectc
sosa:Samplec
time:TemporalEntityc
Restrictions geosparql:defaultGeometry only geo:Pointc
geosparql:defaultGeometry exactly 1
sosa:isSampleOf some http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/EcologicalCommunityc

Site or locationc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Site
Description

Location where observations may be made May be a plot, quadrat, transect, trap etc
Super-classes sosa:Samplec
geosparql:SpatialObjectc
Restrictions sosa:isResultOf only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteVisitc
prov:wasGeneratedBy only prov:Activityc
locn:location only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Locationc
dct:hasPart only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
dct:isPartOf only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/siteDescriptionop min 1
dct:relation some http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
dct:created exactly 1
sosa:isSampleOf some (http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/EnvironmentalSystemc or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/EnvironmentalZonec)
In domain of http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/siteDescriptionop
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/floristicsop
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/sampleTypeop
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/sampleLevelop

Vegetation stratumc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteStratum
Description

Structural element covering a recognisable height range in vegetation ecosystem occurring at an observation site
Super-classes sosa:Samplec
Restrictions sosa:isSampleOf only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/stratumop exactly 1

Single taxon communityc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteStratumTaxon
Description

Community of a single taxon in an identified stratum in a vegetation ecosystem occurring at an observation site
Super-classes sosa:Samplec
Restrictions sosa:isFeatureOfInterestOf min 1
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/stratumop exactly 1
sosa:isSampleOf min 1 http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/taxonop exactly 1
sosa:isSampleOf some http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteStratumc
sosa:isSampleOf some http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteTaxonc

Single taxon communityc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/SiteTaxon
Description

Community of a single taxon in vegetation ecosystem occurring at an observation site
Super-classes sosa:Samplec
Restrictions sosa:isSampleOf only http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/taxonop exactly 1

Ecology Observationc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/Observation
Super-classes sosa:Observationc
Restrictions sosa:hasFeatureOfInterest only (http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/EnvironmentalContinuantc or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/OrganismOccurencec or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/OrganismOccurencec)
http://www.w3.org/ns/ssn/ext/hasUltimateFeatureOfInterest only (http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/EnvironmentalContinuantc or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/OrganismOccurencec or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec or http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/OrganismOccurencec)

Visit to a study locationc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/StudyLocationVisit
Super-classes prov:Activityc
Restrictions prov:used some http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/StudyLocationc

Surveyc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/Survey
Description

Survey is composed of a set of Observations and ObservationCollections, which may have a site as its feature-of-interest In this context the value of feature-of-interest is expected to be the value of the chain (ssn-ext:hasMember)+/sosa:hasFeatureOfInterest
Super-classes prov:Activityc
Restrictions locn:location only skos:Conceptc
sosa:hasFeatureOfInterest min 1 http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Sitec
dct:title exactly 1
prov:wasAssociatedWith some prov:Organizationc
dct:accessRights exactly 1 odrl:Permissionc
dc:creator min 1
dct:license exactly 1 odrl:Policyc

Taxon assignment observationc

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/TaxonAssignment
Super-classes sosa:Observationc
Restrictions sosa:observedProperty value http://www.tern.org.au/cv/op/Taxon-identityc

Description To allow links between observations or site-visits and projects, programs and initiatives, between observations and site-visits, etc

Quality of individual or related observation resultsop

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/hasResultQuality
Description this property allows an indication of the quality of the data to be provided at the level of either an individual observation or a thematic group. This is commonly done by some kind of description of the method, protocol, sensor, observer, etc.
Domain(s) (sosa:Observationc or http://www.w3.org/ns/ssn/ext/ObservationCollectionc)

describes the location ofop

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/x/isLocationOf
Description Links an individual location description to the resource (e.g. a plot:Site) that it relates to
Inverse properties locn:location
Domain(s) http://linked.data.gov.au/def/plot/Locationc
